content.raw:
Not sure if this is possible, but it might be convenient to have a way to enable/disable logging through options, so we don't need to change cloudsim-sim next time.

The portal could enable/disable this option when launching the machine according to whether it is currently on competition mode or not.
content.html:
Not sure if this is possible, but it might be convenient to have a way to enable/disable logging through options, so we don't need to change cloudsim-sim next time.

The portal could enable/disable this option when launching the machine according to whether it is currently on competition mode or not.
